<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2159</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2159</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Els sectors econòmics</string>
            <string language="en">Economic sectors</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ökonomische Sektoren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Secteurs économiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Setores econômicos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Settori economici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικονομικοί τομείς</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recurs educatiu que informa sobre les diferents activitats econòmiques incloses en els tres sectors productius: el primari, el secundari i el terciari. Conté un enllaç per ampliar-ne la informació.</string>
            <string language="en">Teaching resource on the different economic activities in each of the three sectors of production: primary, secondary, and tertiary. It includes a link for further information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">economia</string>
            <string language="en">economy</string>
            <string language="es">economía</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">sector terciari</string>
            <string language="en">tertiary sector</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtendes Hilfsmittel auf dem 
unterschiedlichen Wirtschaftsleben in jedem der drei Sektoren der 
Produktion: hauptsächlich, zweitens und tertiär. Sie 
schließt ein Link für weitere Informationen ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressource d'enseignement sur les différentes 
activités économiques dans chacun des trois secteurs de la 
production : primaire, secondaire, et tertiaire. Elle 
inclut un lien pour de plus amples informations.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recurso ensinando nas atividades econômicas 
diferentes em cada um dos três setores da produção: 
preliminar, secundário, e tertiary. Inclui uma ligação 
para uma informação mais adicional.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorsa d'istruzione sulle attività economiche 
differenti in ciascuno dei tre settori di produzione: primario, 
secondario e terziario. Include un collegamento per ulteriori 
informazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς διδασκαλίας στις διαφορετικές 
οικονομικές δραστηριότητες σε κάθε ένας από τους τρεις τομείς 
της παραγωγής: αρχικός, δευτεροβάθμιος, και τριτογενής. 
Περιλαμβάνει μια σύνδεση για περισσότερες πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wirtschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tertiärer Sektor</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">économie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">secteur tertiaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">economia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">setor tertiary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">economia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">settore terziario</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">οικονομία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τριτογενής τομέας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
